attribute.name: cellpadding
attribute.description: HTML: Specifies the amount of empty space between the cell border and its contents. It can be either a pixel length or a percentage.

attribute.name: cellspacing
attribute.description: HTML: Specifies the amount of space between the cells of the table. It can be either a pixel length or a percentage of available space.

attribute.name: frame
attribute.description: HTML: Controls what part of the frame that surrounds a table is visible. Values include: void, above, below, hsides, lhs, rhs, vsides, box, and border.

attribute.name: rules
attribute.description: HTML: Controls how rules are rendered between cells. Values include: none, groups, rows, cols, and all.

attribute.name: summary
attribute.description: HTML: Provides a summary of the contents of the table, for accessibility purposes.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: HTML: Specifies the desired width of the table, as a pixel length or a percentage of available space.
